member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT
member.summary: The EMRTRANSPARENTBLT structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.xDest
member.summary: Logical x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.yDest
member.summary: Logical y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.cxDest
member.summary: Logical width of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.cyDest
member.summary: Logical height of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.xSrc
member.summary: Logical x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.ySrc
member.summary: Logical y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.xformSrc
member.summary: World-space to page-space transformation of the source device context.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.crBkColorSrc
member.summary: Background color (the RGB value) of the source device context. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.iUsageSrc
member.summary: Source bitmap information color table usage (DIB_RGB_COLORS).

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.offBitsSrc
member.summary: Offset to the source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.cbBitsSrc
member.summary: Size of the source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.cxSrc
member.summary: Width of the source rectangle, in logical units.

member.name: EMREMRTRANSPARENTBLT.cySrc
member.summary: Height of the source rectangle, in logical units.
